mapper.insert: INSERT INTO attraction_user (attraction_id, user_id, created_at) VALUES (#{attraction.attractionId}, #{userId}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT a.attraction_id, a.title, a.content_id, a.first_image, a.map_x, a.map_y, a.address FROM attractions a INNER JOIN attraction_user au ON a.attraction_id = au.attraction_id WHERE au.user_id = #{userId}
